entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 a.m. MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 6:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: ESE 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing this morning. Blowing snow at times early this morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this evening then snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
